name: Amber
title: Gliding Champion
description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

normal.1: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

charged.1: Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
charged.2: While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>.

plunging.1: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.
3: Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.6: Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
description.7: The longer the button is held, the further the throw.
description.9: Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

description.0: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.
Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
description.1: Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

constellation1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All

description.0: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
description.1: Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

description.0: Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
